unnormalised: Boss, seriously, did you even read the fine print of the Labour Law? My friend Ravi was fired for coming late 3 times in a week! Is that even legal? I thought there was a clause about giving a warning first? Advocate Sharma uncle told us there's something in the act, maybe Sec. 47A or something, that protects workers from unfair dismissal. He said go consult the Labour Court immediately or at least file a complaint online at labour.gov.in. It's just not right, yaar!
